alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Tuscaloosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 2:31PM CDT until July 28 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Tuscaloosa County in west central Alabama... West central Bibb County in central Alabama... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 231 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Coaling to near Mertz, and are nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Coaling, Lake Wildwood, Low Gap, Mertz, Duncanville, Camp Horne B.S.A. and Hagler. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
